ГОВНО БЛ(ЯТЬ СПЕЙС МОЖЕТ НОРМАЛЬНО НАЖИМАТЬСЯ НА0ХУЙ?

Been playing this for a few month now.   Basically, it's a hunt-or-be-hunted multiplayer online game based on some of the classic horror movie tropes of the last few decades... a group of four survivors being chased by an unkillable, and somewhat overpowered killer in a closed environment.  The survivors must repair 5 generators placed throughout the map, ultimately powering an exit gate that leads to freedom.   The killer is there to kill all four survivors before they do just that.  On the plus side, as an online multiplayer game both the survivors and killers are real people, so there's never really a dull AI whose behaviors can be learned.   Also, you can play as either survivor or killer, each with a distinct gameplay experience, so it's like getting two games in one.    On the downside, there's a lot of bugs.  To the developers credit, they tackle most of them with fairly frequent updates.  But new fixes often beget new bugs, and the cycle  goes on and on.  Also, the game's ranking system is a bit pointless.   There are month-long seasons where each player is ranked by both their survivor and killer skills.  But problem with how rank points (called "pips") are given or taken away can been very very frustrating.   For example, four survivors may join a match, then one or more may abruptly disconnect, making survival odds for those remaining extremely difficult --- ultimately resulting in a loss of pips.  The player's overall character level, completely separate from the season ranking, isn't really used for anything, and just grows and grows the longer you play -- with no actual connection to the gameplay itself.   Lastly, you get a lot of unsportsmanlike players that will camp hooks or use 3rd party voice chat apps and really take all the fun out of the game.   Oh wait -- one more thing -- the game queuing system is a disaster.   When you're waiting for other players to join your match, sometimes the matchmaking system fails and you're left hanging forever, or it simply disconnects without warning.  Still, despite these shortcomings, the games is pretty addictive when it works.   Simple gameplay.  High intensity.  (There's nothing like a killer jumping out of nowhere when you're fixing a gen.)  Definitely recommended.

This game is one of the bests i have ever played in my life. The core gamplay is really fun, the idea of having 4 survivors and 1 killer is great. The community can be pretty mean for the killers and balancing hasn't been so great, but they keep improving the game with time and it just gets better! Thank you for creating that game that i can enjoy after i finish my classes in highschool.

According to the developers themselves, this game was made to feel frustrating. Not fun, frustrating. :)

If that doesn't sound bad enough and you actually want to feel the frustration instead of turning around and spending your money on something better, then go ahead, buy it.

Most of the game is balanced to the survivor's side (including the current winter event, which the only "event mechanic" it introduces is literally hindering the killer), there's like 4-5 perks on each role that are actually worth using, the maps are extremely unbalanced or outright broken, the devs don't, and I can't stress this enough, the devs DON'T listen to the community in any regard be it balance wise or anything like that.

Instead they brush off the player base criticism with "well the statistics say otherwise". There was this perk in the game for survivors that was being completely exploited to screw over killers, for years, right? Decisive Strike is the name of the perk. It was infuriating, and killers would tunnel those survivors that exploited it. But because "the statistics shows that survivors who use this perk, usually don't make it alive" (I wonder why) they took, 4, years, to fix it.

Another great one as well is removing every event from the game aside from halloween and christmas, "so they can better work on those events and make them better". That was 2 years ago. Halloween is still the same garbage, but worse, because now you cant even earn halloween skins by playing, only paying, and this is the first time christmas actually does something and what they decided to do, was to hinder the Killers even more during the event.

But hey it's your choice if you actually feel like going into this feel free for that. ~

But you might want to check r/DeadbyDaylight beforehand and realize that me, and everyone else that bought the game and played 1000+ hours, actually doesn't have fun with it the majority of the time and only really play it because in essence, this game IS an addiction.

I've had a lot of fun playing this game. About the community being toxic I must say.... I don't see it? Sure I've found some people writing weird sh*t in the chat but this is the internet, did you really expect completely normal people? I also must apologize for being a coward and prioritizing my own survival when there is only one other person left but I'm terrified of The Huntress. Overall advice, don't take the game too seriously and just have fun, and if you find a chat you don't like then guess what.... You have the option to disconnect and try another one.

Weirdest chats I've encountered:
"Tunnel me Daddy" - we were all females -
"8=============D" - self-explanatory, the man obviously has a huge peepee-

Вот наконец настал тот момент когда я наиграл в данный "шедевр" 1000 ч. Но кому кроме меня не пох. Так что... да я хз что тут можно написать, Ну я думаю про данный проект вы уже давно всё знаете так что рассказывать нету смысла. Я скажу только то что несмотря на всю забагованность игры и лень, разрабы всё-же стараются и пилят новый контент (при чём в последнее время даже достаточно интересный) Стараются завозить новые полезные перки, новых интересных манов (Сенобит не в счёт) И всячески улучшать и оптимизировать игру. А если вы так не считаете, то.... Ну всем как бы пох и разрабам тоже, что вы им сделаете, ведь у данного творения нету и скорее всего никогда не появятся конкуренты) Так что если ломаетесь над покупкой, то............. Вы что тут вообще забыли? Бегом смотреть обзоры видосики а потом СРОЧНО! брать (Если уже посмотрели видосики, то идите берите. За такую цену игра вполне себе справляется с задачей развлекания игроков) Я оКончил! Удачи! <3

Not worth playing. Game is based around a perk meta and if you don't have those perks (many of which are DLC only) you will be at a severe disadvantage. The meta is garbage, unique and interesting setups will get you killed. There is also no balance, at all, around what kind of perks killers are allowed to equip or how many broken perks they are allowed to equip at once. If there was, maybe the game would be good. But as it is right now, it's just lazily designed.

No game você se junta a 3 sobreviventes ( ou pode escolher ser o killer) e tem a missão de completar 5 geradores para poder abrir 2 portões ( ou só um deles) e fugir...já o killer...óbvio né?

O jogo conta com um sistema de percks ( habilidades) que o jogador pode desbloquear e modificar antes de entrar em partida, além das oferendas que possibilitam o sobrevivente ou killer cair em mapas especificos ou ganhar mais dinheiro por partida ( o killer também tem o sistema de percks) etc.

It's got good gameplay diversity from the killers side of things, and survivor can be a good time with friends, it receives regular updates and new chapters, and you can technically earn a character without paying money, but by not means is this a consistant method to do so. You will probably have to drop some extra cash to get more out of this game, but I don't mind it too much as I enjoy it and play semi-regularly, one of the better murder hide n seek games. If you don't want to pay more that the entry fee, look elsewhere

EDIT: Well I've got 1589hours of gameplay which means more than 2 years of playing Dead By daylight with all DLC's Purchased and I do main Survivors and Nurse as Killer, at the beginning there were toxics but not more than now, My true rank's Red Rank but I can't even pass de Gold rank you know why? Because every game, every killers Tunnel, Camp, uses NOED and of course Basement Camp we (the survivors) we can lose like -1 pip even if we got Camped but you know what? killers can camp and they can even follow you the entire map for tunnel ya till you die they'll gain more BPs and ofc 1 pip!

We got nerfed "Instant Heal", "Boon", "Decisive Strike" (which was our only way out for get rid of the toxics but devs had to nerf it L.O.L) and lot of others perks and imagine what killers have and not got nerfed yet? "N.O.E.D", "Rancor", "Booba's Chainsaw", "Trixter" I don't even know what this "killer" is doing in this game fr..

Well all of this words for tell you guys I'm leaving Dead By daylight for real now and joining PropNight hopefuly that game isn't doing things for killers only..

Good Luck and have fun!
-Feitan

Dead by daylight is an amazing game that is constantly pushing a new killer/survivor every few months. It's constantly being worked on (as no game is perfect).
The community is full of your standard toxic people that any competitive game has, but there's a good portion of people that aren't like that as well. I find that the community is much better than it was a year ago, so I have high hopes for further improvement.

Many people that don't understand the quirks of the gameplay often get frustrated all too quickly and will write it off as a "bullshit game." But if you're willing to take the time to learn the tricks of the trade you'll do just fine.
Faça bem a si mesmo e não chegue perto disso

Great game.
However, finding low latency games can be difficult at times.

Had you asked me about this game a few months after release, or even just a few days ago, it would've been an absolute recommend. 

Here's the story.

I beta tested this game and was instantly loving every aspect of it.  Release came and went and I played my fair share.  Taking screenshots of my stat screens when I did well, and just overall having a great time playing.  I even bought it for my wife so we could play together.  Had loads of fun.  

Fast forward to 2019, 5/27/19 to be exact.  I had a sudden itch to play.  So i reinstall and load it up.  All my character progress was gone.  Everything had been reset.  I figured something happened with the game requiring a wipe or something so I didn't think anything of it.  Then my wife finally logs in to play and she still has all of her bloodpoints and items along with survivor levels and killer levels.  

I immediately go to the forums thinking that maybe her account was bugged or something only to find out that my account was the one with problems.  I shouldn't have lost my stuff.  So I make a ticket as it says to do, not really worried because it asks for screens of your characters with points and levels showing, which I had, since I was taking screenshots every time I did well.  The screenshots I supplied weren't "good enough" and I needed screenshots from my character screen, even though everything they require to be in the picture as in the picture.  Yes because normal people who have no interest in streaming or making videos would have random screenshots showing their progress.

Quoted directly from the email 

[b][i]"Full-screen images of your Killer and Survivor characters with levels where all of the game's currency (iridescent shards and bloodpoints), your in-game name, and player rank are visible."[/i][/b]

Everything they asked for was in the screenshots EXCEPT iridescent shards because there was no such thing in 2016.

All in all I lost 44-48 hours of progress.  We put our trust in to these companies and this is how they treat us.

Now for the actual game.  It can be a lot of fun.  There aren't any dedicated servers, and the killer hosts the game.  So if the host's connection isn't the best, then neither will be your experience.

+ Dá sa celkom rýchlo expiť a hojný počet bloodpointov
+ Denné rituály sú top
+ Pridali ste viac epic killerov a niektoré skiny sú top
+ Hra je rýchla, survival aj killer je dobre hrateľný (ak sa hrá fair play)
+ Horrorovka kde si pri čakaní aspoň môžem prečítať backstories
+ Posledný update je síce super ale málokedy je to použiteľné (odpočítavanie)
+ Rýchle napájanie do hry s kamarátmi
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Hra naďalej buguje a laguje, našťastie už oveľa menej
- Malá ochrana, hráči zneužívajú addony a cheatujú (mapky na obrazovke, nekonečné bloodpointy, manipulujú so speedom...) ešte sa nájdu aj donášači...
- Už urobte konečne niečo s campovaním, survival to má náročnejšie a dostáva málo pointov, potom sa nečudujte že väčšina hráčov radšej hrá sa killera a dlho to trvá, nehovoriac o leaveroch, ktorý radi dojebavajú hru a zdržujú
- DLC a rôzne doplnky sú sku*vene drahé, dajte viac než -10%, ďalej outfit za 10€ nemôže mať len reprezentačný účel, prihoďte tam niečo, aspoň bonus s bloodpointami a znížte ceny v DLC.
- Zišli by sa nejaké emotikony, nové skiny, špeciálne mapy
This game is beautiful, fun, and spoopy. I recommend.

Un excellent jeu à qui veut prendre le temps de l'appréhender, on peut être décourager par l'attitude de certains joueurs mais si on laisse ce point de côté, le jeu offre vraiment du plaisir. 
Les tueurs sont malheureusement trop avantagé et il devient difficile pour les survivants de faire face sans une bonne coopération. 

Si vous débutez l'aventure, soyez patient, regardez des streams et à force vous prendrez de plus en plus de plaisir ! 

J'attends principalement les serveurs dédié et un équilibrage plus juste du jeu, bien que je sois conscient que la balance est très sensible !
